Reviews.Title: Great Phone, Exactly the right size, works 2G & 3G in S. America on Movistar, Claro and Tigo. In the U.S. on AT&T;
Reviews.Author: KC
Reviews.Content: The 3 1/2" screen (size of I Phone) was to small, the G3 was to large and the S3-MINI, well a perfect size to read, write and keep in a pants or shirt pocket. Speed is fast in 3G, just DO NOT load your phone up with every app you find or you can experience some major slowing. This is not a 3g Mini issue, this applies to any smart phone on the market.As the title states, this phone WILL work on 3G in South America using MOVISTAR, TIGO or CLARO. I travel there quite a bit and tested this phone on my last trip using each of the three companies Sim chips. The 3G data was transmitted on the 850 band width. Just make sure your phone is the "L" model. I have found the 3G speeds to be fine for GPS directions and turn by turn mapping while driving. No phone freezing or lag time.In the U.S, this phone will work in 3G on AT&T;, either a contract or " Go Phone". IT WILL NOT WORK WITH T-MOBILE in 3G data. It will work with T-Mobile on their 2G bands.Battery life is good and the screen is bright and clear. Speakers are loud and clear for calls and I have had no problems with the listener being able to understand me. A car charger is a must have if you drive.This phone has the SAMSUNG-DIVE anti theft software installed so you can easily track your phone, lock it or wipe you data in the event it is lost or stolen. This service is FREE since it is a Samsung device. Go to SAMSUNGDIVE.COM to get all the technical info about how this service works.Another thing I like about this phone is NO branded locked in software that you can't remove. No branding so you don't get any carrier start up screens.We purchased three of these phones. One for my wife, one for me and a spare.SWYPE & DRAGON. This is a must have program in my opinion. SWYPE is fast for typing and DRAGON is lightning fast (and accurate) converting speech to text. Great for emails and texting. These programs work great on this phone.Have not found any negatives with this phone yet and don't expect any. For under $300.00 this is a great value, nice feature set. Samsung put just the right amount of apps on this phone that 90% of people will find themselves using. No useless junk ware.I am not a gamer, so I can't speak to gaming on this phone with regards to game speeds or screen freeze.As for as repair work, it is important to know that the major carriers in S. America DO SELL the G3 Mini (i8190L) so in the event you needed a new screen or other service work, they should have the parts and technical data available to work on your phone.Only thing to add would be to get yourself a good screen protector and a case that protects the corners in the event you should drop it.So get it and start enjoying it. I nice phone at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: Received wrong phone!
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: First I was excited because the phone worked pretty well... then I figured out that they send me the wrong model of this phone! it suppose to have the L in the model as advertised... but they send me the model without the L, and as it was supposed to be used in Latinamerica 3g wouldn't work! beware about the seller, and check if its the correct model.

Reviews.Title: What's Not To Like??
Reviews.Author: RumPunch
Reviews.Content: This phone is awesome!!!  I bought the GT-i8190L, based on the reviews and the fact that it works well in Latin America, the Caribbean and Europe, where I spend a lot of time.  It even works in Afghanistan and Dubai on the Etisalat and Roshan Networks!If I had this phone 3 years ago, I would never have purchased an iPod, because this phone does everything my iPod does in addition to the phone function.  The sound quality is excellent, it plays videos and music seamlessly, the bluetooth function works seamlessly, The Kindle app works, email is awesome, surfing the net is awesome.  The touchscreen response is quick, smooth, and seamless, the facial recognition works, GPS works (even in Afghanistan), FM radio works there too, Camera is superb and there are two of them, it's very user friendly / intuitive, we can all use more battery time right? well this phone will not disappoint and if you turn off functions that you are not using especially GPS for example you would be fine.  I can read Word and PDF docs.  If I had one complaint it would be the ear piece, but with a bluetooth receiver that most of us use anyway...walla!  Oh, did I tell you this phone is UNLOCKED!!!!Yes! Really and Truly unlocked! Will work in Europe, Middle East (Dubai, Afghanistan for sure), Caribbean, Latin America, AT&T;, Verizon, T-Mobile and Walmart SIM cards.Finally, the price is right. That plus all the functionality of this "bad boy" I say you cannot go wrong.  I lack nothing with this phone!  I am a Happy Camper.

Reviews.Title: Nice features in a small package
Reviews.Author: Mastoo
Reviews.Content: Nice way to get the latest android in a smaller form factor.  It seems to only have 4 GB instead internal storage but adding a 32 GB card gives plenty of room.  I bought the GT-I8190 first by mistake and found I needed this one (GT-I8190L) for the local AT&T; frequencies.  Setup was fairly easy and all features work.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Debbie Dwyer Hope
Reviews.Content: Hasslefreecell delivered on this one. It was the version ordered - unlocked i8190L as opposed to i8190 which is the version that will work without a hitch in my section of the world (Jamaica). It was unlocked and brand new as indicated and does not appear to be refurbished. The seller's terms are reasonable and they delivered as advertised. I would go with them again and would recommend them if you are interested in this product.It uses regular sized sim card so you don't have to get yours cut or go out and get a mini one. Frankly unless you have small hands it may not feel very manly. The touchscreen keyboard buttons are small even for a woman's hands, even when you use it landscape. But it you are not flashy and like to keep things simple then this will work for you because it fits well in the pocket. Using the touchscreen keyboard takes some getting used to coming from a qwerty keypad smartphone and some creativity in tapping so as to click the digits you intend.Please read the little instruction booklet that comes with it. You will learn more than you think - like how to answer a call. You can't answer a call by just tapping the green call button. Daisy S. post is very helpful as it relates to bloat ware that you can disable to save on battery usage and also in overall review of the product. If you have prepaid phone service (for buyers in countries like Jamaica) ensure to disable data roaming and data usage when you are not utilizing it otherwise it will eat up your credit. This is easily done - just Google how to do it. Use Wi-Fi instead when you can.It takes good pictures and does good videos.All in all it is a good phone to enter the android platform as a user - there is still much to learn about its features but so far so good; a satisfactory buy.

Reviews.Title: I loved my phone
Reviews.Author: Ali V.
Reviews.Content: The phone is in perfect condition buy it for use in Venezuela and works properly with the operator. Recommended is a fast phone, practical and functional.

Reviews.Title: 3g 850 right for Argentina
Reviews.Author: Marcos Anchorena "Elpatron"
Reviews.Content: Not much to add about the phone...simply GREAT.If you are planning to use this phone in Argentina this is the corect model to get 3g network

Reviews.Title: best phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Mariqui
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I've ever had, size is perfect, has a good ram, it's fast...  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Great great phone BUT.....
Reviews.Author: Fay L Samuels
Reviews.Content: I loved everything about this phone. The looks, the functionality, the size, the camera, the screen....everything! Until I realised this phone would not pick up properly. At first I thought it must be my network carrier but then even when I was in a city surrounded by cell-towers and great signal my phone would constantly drop signal or have very weak signal. Sometimes the bars would show sufficient signal only for me to have dropped calls or get voice mails hours later saying I missed some call. Even though I truly loved this phone and the dealer was quick and the phone came brand new out of the wrapper I couldn't be content with the signal issues, losing calls etc, the most important reason for owning a phone, so I returned it and decided to stick to get a Nokia.

Reviews.Title: ok
Reviews.Author: K.T. "Karen"
Reviews.Content: its a nice phone but I hope it worked as well. I would try a newer one since this phone get real slow... maybe as slow as a blackberry which I don't like

Reviews.Title: Nice...!
Reviews.Author: Joer Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Best regards from Venezuela.I recommend this phone model, besides being economical is very comfortable and meets the expectations I have with Samsung. Use it with the company Movistar since that is handled in the 3G 850. Greetings and excuse my English. JV

Reviews.Title: Ordered GT-i8190L Galaxy S3 Mini and received GT-i8190N
Reviews.Author: MIREYA
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 hours to research the right cellphone that would work in 3G with the carrier of my preference and sadly I did not received what I ordered. I lost the trust with the seller WorldWide Distributors as it is unethical to deceive their clients by stating something in the description and sending a totally different product. I hope for te good of WorldWide Distributors' reputation that they write accurate descriptions.

Reviews.Title: Total deception
Reviews.Author: LAURA MOGOLLON
Reviews.Content: I received another phone model. He had already commissioned a model and everything arrived safely and request another and I get HSDPA 900/1900/2100 model. Now that cell because almost lost in Venezuela runs on a single telephone company, which does not use. They should be more careful with orders.

Reviews.Title: The phone died after 2 MONTHS!!!
Reviews.Author: Jilon Morancie
Reviews.Content: I am from Trinidad, West Indies. Purchased this phone in December 2013. It worked fine until yesterday when it began moving a bit slowly. This morning, THE PHONE IS DEAD. No warning, and no it has never been dropped, never gotten wet or been any where near water, it is just dead. US$284 down the tubes. No I would not recommend any Samsung purchase ever again. I would also be sending this to Samsung's website to let them know how upset and disgusted I am.Signed: Jilon-very angry customer

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: L Kaye
Reviews.Content: The phone was delivered promptly as promised and looks real nice and new out of the box. It works well in Jamaica.  Bought it for my son who absolutely loves it.  Good purchase.

Reviews.Title: amazon good afternoon gentlemen
Reviews.Author: Gremil Rivero
Reviews.Content: amazon good afternoon gentlemen, I hope you can help in the following problem: I bought a computer seller HassleFreeCell Samsung Galaxy S3 GT-i8190L Blue Mini Unlocked 3G 850/1900/2100 factory. This team never received because the company staff entrustment when I get to it Venezuela theft so I need you to send me the code of the IM team to trace and formalize the complaint with the authorities of my country. thanks before hand and I expect a positive response from their god bless part

Reviews.Title: Wrong model?
Reviews.Author: JMK 10
Reviews.Content: I received the item as scheduled, but believe I was sent the wrong model.  The sticker w/ barcode indicates it is the i8190L, but the start up screen on the phone and the accompanying manual both say 'i8190' only.  I was also told that the ATT Go Phone will work with the "L" only, yet when I insert the sim card it still says 'No mobile network found" and does not read/detect my sim card.  I have a micro-SD and though I see it listed under "Storage," it is grayed out and I cannot access it.Please reply with recommended next steps.  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: Meh...
Reviews.Author: Lucill Pumarol
Reviews.Content: The phone is good and works fine. Had to switch carriers because the phone is a different frequency or something (didn't read that part of the description) and purchased a micro-sd card since it didn't come with one.

Reviews.Title: Ideal Phone
Reviews.Author: Alejandro C. Carias R "Alejandro C."
Reviews.Content: This is a very confortable cel phone for his size, really easy to use and powerfull enought to the daily work

Reviews.Title: Luv it luv it luv it
Reviews.Author: Britney Tears "Brit"
Reviews.Content: I love this phone.  I was worried that it would not be able to work in my country but I was away and i was able to roam with it so I knew it would work when i got home. It's small, neat, has some nice features and functionable. It's a good start if you cannot afford the S3 or S4.I only have it for about 15 days now.  I find though the battery has run down fast within the last two days that i had it, probably i have something taking up battery life, but the phone is a great one.  Only wish the price was a little cheaper but will recommend it. thanks for those who posted their reviews that helped me make my choice.  Happy new Year to all!!! Live peacably in 2014 and do good!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Edison M "Edison M"
Reviews.Content: this cell phone is the best product that i have untill the moment.. the prone came with all the original accesories and work perfectly with any carrier that the vendor said ....

Reviews.Title: My wife is very happy with it
Reviews.Author: Igor Fernandez "Gotawa"
Reviews.Content: Excelent device. Very predictible fuction. My wife was a BB owner, now  she is very happywith it. The only problem is with a lenguaje configuration, i couldnt find the spanish dictionary option. But its a stronger device

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Boublil
Reviews.Content: It compeled all my expectations. Work fine, in time and until now i had no problem with it.I Recommend it strongly

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Samsung S3 mini
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I love this cellphone, thin, light, beautiful display, fits in one hand very easy to use. I'm in my fifties and this is my first smartphone...no problems at all-.

Reviews.Title: I loved it
Reviews.Author: Paola
Reviews.Content: Very good product, i bougth it for my son and he is very happy and grateful. I have another samsung of my own, but this one is definetely better in all aspects.

Reviews.Title: EXCELENT
Reviews.Author: ALIG
Reviews.Content: I AM IN VENEZUELA, TAKE IT TO A SERVICE CENTER FOR A CONNECTION MANAGER CONFIGURATION AND SO WOULD HAVE NO PROBLEMS, GREAT WORK ME, BUY THE VERSION FOR LATIN AMERICA

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Yaya
Reviews.Content: This was my birthday gift and I am happy with it.. It was more than the expected. I had a Blackberry and I feel this was a great change for me.

Reviews.Title: Didnt get a chance
Reviews.Author: Mr. "Donjaun"
Reviews.Content: My kid loved it for about a week then someone stole it . Great for kids or for someone that likes the s3 but wants a smaller phone . I would recommend just getting the full size s3 with LTE . You can really notice the difference in performance .

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Maria Angelica Solari
Reviews.Content: the quality of the telephone its better than I expectations.Hight definition of the cameraultrathinlightweighthigh sound quality

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: This phone is so cool.  I upgraded from a blackberry and I am sorry that I did not do so sooner.  This phone has all the features that I like and need and represents good value for money.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: De Leon Pineda Ernesto
Reviews.Content: my galaxsy sii phone is excelent, because all character is like say seller, performance of applications is very fast, I recomended this phone.

Reviews.Title: The top gun
Reviews.Author: Pancho
Reviews.Content: Really a top gun smartphone, same app of Samsung S3 but in a small case, very fast, a lot of new application, I had a Galaxy ACE, and this is the night vs day, is a tablet samsung Tab 2 in my hand

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Mariela Etchegaray "jaspme"
Reviews.Content: This phone is great, I love it and my son will too. Thanks we are very pleased. S y s
